TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit X500DistinguishedName extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData
Public NotInheritable Class X500DistinguishedName Inherits AsnEncodedData

Attribute.AttributeName: System.MonoTODO("Some X500DistinguishedNameFlags options aren't supported, like DoNotUsePlusSign, DoNotUseQuotes and ForceUTF8Encoding")

summary.span: 表示 X509 证书的可分辨名称。

span.span: Represents the distinguished name of an X509 certificate.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是类似的扩展或属性，它是人或证书颁发给的实体的名称。This class is like an extension to the or property, which is the name of the person or entity that the certificate is being issued to. X.500 是分布式的目录服务的国际标准。X.500 is an international standard for distributed directory services. 可分辨的名称使用以下格式：The distinguished name uses the following format: [X500:/C=CountryCode/O=Organization/OU=OrganizationUnit/CN=CommonName][X500:/C=CountryCode/O=Organization/OU=OrganizationUnit/CN=CommonName] 以下字段长度限制适用：The following field length limits apply: |字段Field|长度限制Length Limit| |-----------|------------------| |国家/地区代码CountryCode|2 个字符2 characters| |组织Organization|最多 64 个字符Up to 64 characters| |OrganizationUnitOrganizationUnit|最多 32 个字符Up to 32 characters| |CommonNameCommonName|最多 64 个字符Up to 64 characters| 以下准则将适用：The following guidelines apply: - 字段值可以是大写或小写。Field values can be uppercase or lowercase. - 分隔符为斜杠标记 （/），并且必须显示之前的第一个值和后续值之间。Delimiters are slash marks (/) and must appear before the first value and between subsequent values. - 分隔符可以跟一个空格。Delimiters can be followed by a space. 以下是格式正确的名称的示例: [X500: /C = US / O = Microsoft / OU = WGA / CN = TedSt]The following is an example of a correctly formatted name: [X500:/ C=US/ O=Microsoft/ OU=WGA/ CN=TedSt] ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example shows how to use the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X500DistinguishedName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X500DistinguishedName/CPP/x500.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X500DistinguishedName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X500DistinguishedName/CS/x500.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X500DistinguishedName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X500DistinguishedName/VB/x500.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将 ASN 已编码的可分辨的名称解码为一个字符串值。This method decodes the ASN encoded distinguished name into a string value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example shows how to use the class. summary.span: 返回 X500 识别名的格式化版本，以便打印或输出到文本窗口或控制台。

span.span: Returns a formatted version of an X500 distinguished name for printing or for output to a text window or to a console.

returns.span: 一个表示 X500 识别名的格式化字符串。

span.span: A formatted string that represents the X500 distinguished name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来打印抽象语法表示法数字一 (ASN.1)-编码的数据或将信息输出到文本框中。Use this method to print Abstract Syntax Notation number One (ASN.1)-encoded data or output the information to a text box. 使用`multiLine`参数控制的输出的布局。Use the `multiLine` parameter to control the layout of the output. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example shows how to use the class.
